meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with

vlive.korean: '혹시 감금 당하고 있다면' 인가? Is it "If you happened to be imprisoned"? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: Is it "If you happened to be imprisoned"?

vlive.korean: 와... 무용과 애들은 저 일을 계속 당하고 있던 거야? Wow. He has been doing that to dance majors all along? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 변태 선생 경찰차에 태우는 법_EP22_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: Wow. He has been doing that to dance majors all along?

vlive.korean: [결국 오늘도 보자기에 당하고 만 JB...] [JB eventually loses again with paper today...] View video GOT7 : [GOT7(갓세븐) TOURGRAPH] WORLD TOUR 'EYES ON YOU' EP.04
vlive.english: [JB eventually loses again with paper today...]

vlive.korean: 우리가 당하고 있을 것만 같아? Do you think we'll just stand for it? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🦊🐥
vlive.english: Do you think we'll just stand for it?

vlive.korean: 제가 마냥 당하고만 있지 않습니다. I will not be the victim all the time. 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [WekiMeki 위키미키 모해?] EP60 Special List 3. 미니 2집 LUCKY 비하인드+마지막 인사
vlive.english: I will not be the victim all the time.

examples.korean: My son is being bullied at school. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아들이 학교에서 괴롭힘을 당하고 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The referee had been threatened and abused. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 심판은 협박을 당하고 욕을 들었었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The referee had been threatened and abused. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was disgraced and stripped of his title. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 망신을 당하고 타이틀[직함]을 박탈당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was disgraced and stripped of his title. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has complained of being harassed by the police. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 경찰로부터 괴롭힘을 당하고 있다고 호소해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has complained of being harassed by the police. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Men, women and children were slaughtered and villages destroyed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남녀노소가 학살을 당하고 마을들은 파괴되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
